summary: Gym membership management app (Prime Fit Gym) with admin tools for editing memberships/payments, removal of expense tracking, and automated member notifications (email/SMS/WhatsApp) for credentials and plan/payment details.
architectural_notes: Notification system required: backend event/log should correspond to actual outbound delivery (email/SMS/WhatsApp), not just backend status.
known_issues: Email/SMS/WhatsApp notifications appear in backend but are not being delivered to the phone number.

existing_features.title: Update the admin UI member-creation success experience to clearly present Email/SMS/WhatsApp outputs as simulated/not-delivered communication logs (not real notifications), while still allowing the admin to copy credentials and message content.

Add a consistent UI disclaimer anywhere the app shows Email/SMS/WhatsApp ‘notifications’ that these channels are simulated in-app logs and will not be delivered to a phone number within this platform build.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add admin membership editing system (modify member plan, duration, etc.)
Add admin payment editing tools (update member payment details)
Remove expense tracking module and exclude expenses from dashboards/reports
Fix notification delivery: email/SMS/WhatsApp notifications show in backend but are not delivered to the phone number
When admin adds a member, auto-send generated login credentials plus membership plan and payment details via email and also via SMS/WhatsApp to the member’s mobile number

Implement backend support for admin-created members to return a complete onboarding payload that includes the member profile, the admin-provided credentials, and generated communication log entries for Email, SMS, and WhatsApp containing the member’s login credentials plus membership plan and payment details.
